CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: HilleVax Inc is a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company. It is focused on developing and commercializing novel vaccines. The firm's initial program, HIL-214, is a virus-like particle (VLP) based vaccine candidate for the prevention of moderate-to-severe acute gastroenteritis (AGE) caused by norovirus infection.
